title: Welcome to Playground Blog
excerpt: We're excited to share our journey and insights about modern web development with you.
content:
Welcome to the Playground blog! This is where we'll share our thoughts, tutorials, and insights about modern web development.

We'll cover topics like Vue.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and the latest trends in frontend development. Stay tuned for exciting content!
author: Playground Team

title: Building Responsive UIs with Tailwind CSS
excerpt: Learn how to create beautiful, responsive interfaces using Tailwind's utility-first approach.
content:
Tailwind CSS has revolutionized how we think about styling web applications. Its utility-first approach allows for rapid development while maintaining consistency.

In this post, we'll explore some advanced techniques for building responsive layouts that work perfectly across all devices.
author: Sarah Chen

title: Vue 3 Composition API Best Practices
excerpt: Discover the power of Vue 3's Composition API and how to structure your components effectively.
content:
The Vue 3 Composition API offers a more flexible way to organize component logic. It's particularly powerful for complex components and code reuse.

We'll dive into best practices, common patterns, and how to migrate from the Options API.
author: Mike Rodriguez

title: Dark Mode Implementation Guide
excerpt: Step-by-step guide to implementing a beautiful dark mode in your Vue application.
content:
Dark mode has become an essential feature for modern web applications. Users expect seamless switching between light and dark themes.

This guide covers implementation strategies, best practices for color schemes, and how to maintain accessibility standards.
author: Emily Zhang
